summary: A man kidnaps the wife of a cavalry commander in order to exchange her for a Gatling gun that's being sold by a gun runner.
cast: Dean Martin|Brian Keith|Carol White|Honor Blackman|Ben Johnson|Albert Salmi|Don Knight|Joyce Van Patten|Denver Pyle|Merlin Olsen|Robert Donner|Harry Carey Jr.|Judi Meredith|Edward Faulkner|Paul Fix|Armand Alzamora|David Huddleston|Bob Steele|Shirleena Manchur|José Ángel Espinosa 'Ferrusquilla'|Juan García|Bob Gravage|Chuck Hicks|John Kelly|Enrique Lucero|Lupe Amador|Greg Bransom|Joe Gray|'Chico' Hernandez
title: La primera ametralladora del Oeste
